str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
Superlative of elachus; used as equivalent to mikros; least.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To be over-anxious; with acc: To be anxious about, distracted; I care for. From merimna; to be anxious about.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others. Masculine plural of a derivative of leipo; remaining ones.
